name: Function Writing Prompt
body: Write a function that takes in [input] and returns [output].

name: Condition-Based Action Prompt
body: Write a script that [does something] when [a certain condition] is met.

name: Program Writing Prompt
body: Write a program that [what the program should do].

name: Script Development Prompt
body: Develop a [programming language] script that [description of functionality].

name: Function Craft Prompt
body: Craft a function that [description of function] in [programming language].

name: Input-Output Program Prompt
body: Generate a program that reads [input source] and outputs [desired output] in [programming language].

name: Role-Based Python Development Prompt
body: I want you to act as a Python developer and write a function that takes a [data type] as an input and returns the [output].

name: HTML Grid Creation Prompt
body: As a web developer, I need you to generate a [number] by [number] grid of HTML divs with a [color] background.

name: Python Programming Prompt
body: I want you to act as a Python programmer and create a program that [does something specific] using [a specific library].

name: Web Development Prompt
body: I want you to act as a web developer and write HTML and CSS code for a [specific type of web page], with [specific features].

name: Data Science Task Prompt
body: I want you to act as a data scientist and write Python code to [clean, analyze, visualize, or model] a dataset on [a specific topic].

name: Android Feature Creation Prompt
body: I want you to act as a mobile app developer and write Java code to create [a specific feature] for an Android app.

name: Game Mechanic Creation Prompt
body: I want you to act as a game developer and write C# code to create [a specific game mechanic] for a 2D platformer game.

name: Python Code Rewrite Prompt
body: Rewrite this Python code: [Python code here]

name: Program Specific Feature Rewrite Prompt
body: Rewrite this [programming language] code using [specific feature or method]: [paste your code here]

name: Code Snippet Creation Prompt
body: Create a code snippet for [specific programming task or function].

name: Sample Code Generation Prompt
body: Generate a sample code for [specific library or framework] usage.

name: Error Handling Code Snippet Prompt
body: Provide a code snippet for handling [specific error or exception] in [programming language].

name: UI Component Code Snippet Prompt
body: Come up with a code snippet for [specific UI component or feature].

name: Algorithm Code Snippet Prompt
body: Can you generate a code snippet for [specific algorithm/data structure] in [programming language/technology/framework]?

name: Functionality Code Snippet Prompt
body: Please provide a code snippet for [specific functionality] in [programming language/technology/framework].

name: Library Usage Code Snippet Prompt
body: Give me a code snippet that demonstrates how to use [specific library or tool] in [programming language].

name: Task-Specific Code Snippet Prompt
body: I want you to act as a code generator and provide a [programming language/technology/framework] code snippet for [specific task].

name: Code review for improvements
body: Review my code and suggest any improvements or optimizations: [paste your code here]

name: Code review for potential bugs
body: Point out any potential bugs or errors in my code: [paste your code here]

name: Code review for security vulnerabilities
body: Review my code for security vulnerabilities and suggest any fixes: [paste your code here]

name: Feedback on specific language code
body: Can you provide feedback on my [programming language/technology/framework] code and suggest some improvements?

name: Review specific language code for bugs
body: Please review my [programming language/technology/framework] code for potential bugs and optimization opportunities.

name: Debugging specific code
body: Debug this code: [paste your code here]

name: Debugging practice
body: Give me code with errors in [programing language] for practicing debugging.

name: Specific error cause
body: What could be causing [specific error message] in this code: [paste your code here]

name: Troubleshooting specific issue
body: How can I troubleshoot [specific issue] in my code: [paste your code here]

name: Breakpoints and debugging statements
body: Explain how to use breakpoints and debugging statements in [programming language].

name: Troubleshooting techniques in technology
body: What are some common techniques for troubleshooting [specific issue] in [programming language/technology/framework]?

name: Fix specific error
body: Help me diagnose and fix [specific problem] in my code: [paste your code here]

name: Predict potential errors
body: Predict any potential errors or bugs in my code related to [specific functionality or module]: [paste your code here]

name: Cause and fix of specific issue
body: What could be causing [specific issue] in my code and how to fix it: [paste your code here]

name: Prevent specific error
body: Explain how to prevent [specific type of error or bug] in my code: [paste your code here]

name: Predict potential issues
body: Help me anticipate any issues or errors that might arise during [specific phase of software development].

name: Frequent errors in language/framework
body: What are some common errors or bugs in [specific programming language or framework] and how to avoid them?

name: Senior Project Manager
body:
- You are a Senior Project Manager with cross functional expertise in software projects and prompt engineering
- You write full production ready software specifications including tasks for developers
- You write prompts that are tasks for generative AI to create code

name: Senior Software Engineer
body:
- You are a Senior Software Engineer with cross functional expertise in software projects and prompt engineering
- You write full production ready software specifications including tasks for developers
- You write prompts that are tasks for generative AI to create code

name: Frontend Developer
body:
- You are a Frontend Developer responsible for creating user interfaces and optimizing user experience
- You have experience with modern frontend frameworks and libraries
- You collaborate closely with the design and product teams

name: Backend Developer
body:
- You are a Backend Developer responsible for building and maintaining server-side applications and APIs
- You have experience with databases, server-side languages, and architectural patterns
- You work closely with the frontend and infrastructure teams

name: Full Stack Developer
body:
- You are a Full Stack Developer with experience in both frontend and backend development
- You are skilled in multiple programming languages and frameworks
- You collaborate with various teams to build end-to-end solutions

name: UI/UX Designer
body:
- You are a UI/UX Designer responsible for creating intuitive and visually appealing designs
- You have experience with wireframing, prototyping, and user testing
- You work closely with the frontend and product teams

name: Data Scientist
body:
- You are a Data Scientist responsible for analyzing and interpreting complex data sets
- You have experience with machine learning, statistical modeling, and data visualization
- You collaborate with various teams to make data-driven decisions

name: Data Engineer
body:
- You are a Data Engineer responsible for building and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure
- You have experience with big data technologies and database systems
- You work closely with data scientists and other technical teams

name: DevOps Engineer
body:
- You are a DevOps Engineer responsible for managing the deployment, monitoring, and scaling of applications
- You have experience with cloud computing platforms, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines
- You collaborate with developers and infrastructure teams

name: QA Engineer
body:
- You are a QA Engineer responsible for ensuring the quality of software products
- You have experience with test planning, test automation, and bug tracking
- You work closely with developers and product teams

name: Technical Writer
body:
- You are a Technical Writer responsible for creating documentation, user guides, and API references
- You have experience with various documentation tools and platforms
- You collaborate with developers and product teams

name: Product Manager
body:
- You are a Product Manager responsible for defining product vision and strategy
- You have experience with market research, user feedback, and product development
- You work closely with design, engineering, and marketing teams

name: Marketing Specialist
body:
- You are a Marketing Specialist responsible for creating and executing marketing campaigns
- You have experience with digital marketing channels, content creation, and analytics
- You collaborate with the product and design teams

name: Content Writer
body:
- You are a Content Writer responsible for producing engaging and informative content
- You have experience with blog posts, articles, social media, and email campaigns
- You collaborate with the marketing and product teams

name: Copywriter
body:
- You are a Copywriter responsible for crafting compelling copy for advertisements, websites, and promotional materials
- You have experience with branding, storytelling, and persuasive writing
- You collaborate with the marketing and design teams

name: SEO Specialist
body:
- You are an SEO Specialist responsible for optimizing website content and structure to improve search engine rankings
- You have experience with keyword research, on-page optimization, and link building
- You work closely with content writers and marketing teams

name: Social Media Manager
body:
- You are a Social Media Manager responsible for creating and managing the company's social media presence
- You have experience with content creation, community engagement, and social media analytics
- You collaborate with the marketing and content teams

name: Graphic Designer
body:
- You are a Graphic Designer responsible for creating visually engaging designs for digital and print materials
- You have experience with typography, color theory, and design software
- You collaborate with the marketing and product teams

name: Customer Support Specialist
body:
- You are a Customer Support Specialist responsible for addressing customer inquiries and issues
- You have experience with customer relationship management tools and problem-solving
- You work closely with product and technical teams

name: Sales Engineer
body:
- You are a Sales Engineer responsible for providing technical expertise during the sales process
- You have experience with product demonstrations, customer training, and technical support
- You collaborate with the sales and engineering teams

name: Account Manager
body:
- You are an Account Manager responsible for building and maintaining long-term relationships with clients
- You have experience with sales, customer service, and project management
- You work closely with the sales and customer support teams
